如欲了解詳情,請 閣下在 IMCS 踴躍報名參加於1月8日九龍灣國際展貿中心舉行之「2014市場展望投資講座」。
AFS就此修訂會有詳盡解釋,僅此一場,欲免向隅,報名從速。
祝 新年快樂、身體健康、生意興隆!
營業行政部
副首席業務總監,業務行政
-
蔡川艾 謹啓From : Benny Tsoi
Date : 3 January 2014
PRUDENTIAL
英 國 保 誠
To : All Financial Consultants
cc : JT, JL, AS, ADE, EW, EC, BC, EK, SL
Re : Additional Frequently Asked Questions ("FAQ") on Updated Requirements relating to the Sale of
ILAS to Enhance Customer Protection
The Hong Kong Federation of Insurers ("HKFI") has recently added the Frequently Asked Questions ("FAQ") on Updated
Requirements Relating to the Sale of Investment Linked Assurance Scheme ("ILAS") to enhance customer protection and
the Product Sales Flow. The scope of this FAQ is relating to the purposes of buying ILAS plans as stated on the Financial
Needs Analysis ("FNA") and the Important Facts Statement and the Applicant's Declarations ("IFS"). Such change is for
the sake of safe guarding the product suitability of a customer, while clarifying the customer purpose of taking up an ILAS
product can minimize misunderstanding during the initial product proposing stage.
In order to ensure that our company follows the HKFI's best practice of proposing ILAS plans to clients, all the Financial
Consultants should adhere to the following suggestion of answers on FNA & IFS for the following scenario of cases no
later than 24 Jan 2014. Please ensure consistency between the options of the FNA and IFS; and any other purposes
written by the applicants are not recommended, else, the application with inappropriate answers will be held pending and
require re-submission of relevant forms.
ILAS basic plan
ILAS FNA (Q1)
Please tick E
IFS (Basic Plan)
IFS (Top up)
New Business
(1) ILAS basic plan only
1 A. Life Protection
D. Investment
Minor Protection +
Investment
Not Applicable
(2) ILAS + RTU / LTU
After policy
issuance
+ RTU / LTU or
Increase RTU premium
Not Applicable
Not Applicable
Minor Protection +
Investment
Traditional Life policy
ILAS FNA (Q1)
Please tick
JFS
New
Business
+ Investment Plus (INVP)
D. Investment
Investment
(please use the IFS of INVP)
After policy
issuance
+ INVP after policy issuance RTU/LTU)
+ subsequent additional top up premium
to INVP
Not Applicable
Investment
(please use the IFS of top up)
P.S. ILAS : Investment linked assurance scheme, RTU : Regular Top-up, LTU : Lump Sum Top-up, INVP : Investment Plus rider
For the procedure details, Product Sales Flow and HKFI's circular on the issues, please refer to respective AFS's
powerpoint and HKFI's Codes and Regulation which are placed at PIL > Agency Operations > Agency Compliance >
Additional FAQ on Updated Requirement Relating to the Sale of ILAS to enhance Customer Protection - FNA. The
updated FAQ can be accessed through the HKFI website: http://www.hkfi.org.hk/pdf/en/download/e FAQ.pdf.
If you are interested in the topics, you are highly encouraged to enroll at IMCS for the "2014 Market Outlook Investment
Seminar" being held at KITEC on 8 Jan 2014. Our AFS will have detailed briefing about this issue during this episode.
Wish you happy and healthy in 2014. All the best and good selling!
With best regards,
Benny Tsoi
Deputy Chief Agency Officer
Agency Administration Department

results.title_name_en: Change of Automatic Premium Loan Option
results.title_name_tc: 更改自動保費貸款選項
results.content_en:
PRUDENTIAL
英 國
保 誠本
1
Consultant's Name
顧問姓名:
Division - Agent Code
組別-營業員編號:
Proposal / Policy Number(s)
申請書編號/保單號碼:
Life Proposed / Life Assured's Name
受保人姓名:
Application Form for Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項申請表
Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項
Declaration
聲明
I request to apply Automatic Premium Loan clause to the policy which the amount of premium or premium and levy shall be automatically
deemed to be paid by a premium loan and extend to the premium(s) or premium(s) and levy(ies) for any supplementary benefit(s) when the
Plan is paid up.
本人申請應用自動保費貸款條文於此保單,即保費或保費及徵費將自動以貸款的形式繳交,並延續條文於本計劃已繳清所有保費時的附加保障之保費
或保費及徵費。
I declare that I have read and confirm understanding of the important notes below.
本人在此聲明本人已閱讀並確認明白下列注意事項之內容。
Important Notes
注意事項
1. We shall charge you interest on the Automatic Premium Loan(s) starting from the date when the respective Automatic Premium Loan(s)
is incurred. We shall determine the interest rate charged on the Automatic Premium Loan(s).
本公司將會由自動保費貸款日期開始收取自動保費貸款的利息,有關利率將由本公司釐訂。
2. The policy will be automatically terminated once the total outstanding loan amount (including interest) owing to us under your policy
exceeds stated percentage on Policy Contract of the guaranteed cash value of your policy minus all Advanced Claims being paid and / or
payable of this Plan.
本計劃將在 閣下的保單所欠本公司之未償還總金額(包括利息)超過合約訂明比率之保單保證現金價值扣除於本計劃須支付及/或已付訖的預
支賠償總額時立即終止。
I/We declare that I/we have read and confirm understanding of the above content.
本人/吾等在此聲明本人/吾等已閱讀並確認明白上述之內容。
Day
日
Month
月
Year
年
Signature of Proposer / Policyowner
(if other than the Life Proposed / Life
Assured)
投保人/保單持有人簽署(如投保人/保單持有
人與受保人同為一人,可免簽署此欄)
Signature of Life Proposed / Life Assured
(who has attained age 18 or above)
受保人簽署(適用於十八歲或以上的受保人)
Signature of Consultant as Witness
顧問 ( 即見證人 ) 簽署
Name 姓名:
Two witnesses are required if signature chop or fingerprint is used to sign. 若以圖章蓋印或指紋簽署,須有兩位見證人。
Please DO NOT sign on BLANK form. 請勿在空白表格上簽署。
Prudential Hong Kong Limited (A member of Prudential plc group)
保誠保險有限公司(英國保誠集團成員)
PAIAPL0101
Version. 201804

英 國 保 誠
發件人 :
邵安龍
收件人:
所有營業顧問
日期
：
2014年12月29日
副本致:
所有區域經理及以上、所有高級經理及以上
通告
：
有關銷售投資相連壽險計劃之更新及有關安排
承接2014年12月8日發出關於撤銷投資相連壽險計劃之通告,我們現有以下更新:
1. 延長「運籌」晉景投資計劃(PLIP)及「運籌」優越投資計劃(POP2)
根據我們較早前發出之通告,為符合保險業監理處對保險業務C類別最新指引(GN15)之要求,PLIP
及 POP2 將會作出改良。鑑於上述改良版的新產品仍在保險業監理處及香港證監會最後審批中,及有
待正式批准。因此,現時的PLIP及POP2之銷售期將延長至以下最新日期:
PLIP & POP2
RP3/ KIDS2/ IL1/ INVP
最後遞交日期
2015年1月19日下午四時(更新)
2014年12月 31 日下午四時
(INVP: 下午二時)
最後繕發日期*
2015年2月19日(更新)
2015年1月31日
*本公司會於最後繕發日期後取消所有未完成的申請
請注意PLIP之額外首年獎賞推廣將同時延長至2015年1月19日止。
我們預計改良版的PLIP及POP2將於2015年1月20日推出,新產品的詳情及培訓安排,將於稍後公佈。
2. 額外投資保費(定期或一次過)之最新監管要求
為確保符合最新監管要求(GN15),由2015年1月1日起,凡於現有保單上申請定期或一次過額外投資
保費,客戶必須提交完整的理財需要分析表格(FNA)。此外,客戶由2015年1月1日起必須填妥新的重
要資料聲明書及申請人聲明書(IFS)。新版本包括中介人的酬勞及適合性聲明,並
由2015年1月1日起可於 PA000015 PIL位置下載。請依從下表各情況之建議答案填寫FNA及IFS。
投連基本計劃(現有生效保單)
ILAS FNA
(第一條問題)
IFS(額外投資保費)-
目標概要
(1) 附加額外投資保費(定期或一次過)
D. 投資
投資(更新)
(2) 增加定期額外投資保費
D. 投資
投資(更新)
傳統壽險(現有保單並附有生效的「投資寶」)
ILAS FNA
(第一條問題)
IFS(額外投資保費)-
目標概要
(1) 附加額外投資保費(一次過)
D. 投資
投資(更新)
(2) 增加定期額外投資保費
D. 投資
投資(更新)
請與有關同事分享上述資訊。
首席市場拓展及客戶服務總監
邵安龍 謹啟

results.title_name_en: Addition/Increase of Regular Top-up Premium (RTU) / Addition of Lump Sum Top-up Premium
results.title_name_tc: 附加/增加定期額外投資保費或附加一次過額外投資保費
results.content_en:
PRUDENTIAL
英 國 保 誠
From :
Anthony Shaw
Date :
8 December, 2014
To :
All Financial Consultants
CC :
Regional Managers & up, Senior Managers & up
Re :
Withdrawal of ILAS Products
To help protect the rights of customers and ensure that the quality of ILAS business issued by the Hong Kong
insurance industry is as high as possible, the Office of the Commissioner of Insurance (OCI) has issued a
Guidance Note on Underwriting Class C Business (GN15), which will be effective on 1 January 2015. The
major scope of GN15 includes requiring a minimum death benefit of 105% of the account value, ensuring fees
and charges are fair to customers and remuneration structure is appropriate with proper disclosure.
Our current ILAS products do not conform to the new standards contained in GN15. In view of this, the
Company will withdraw the following products with effect from 1 January 2015 i.e. these products will be
removed from the PRUcompass on 1 January 2015:
· PRUlink investment plan(PLIP)
PRUretirement extra(RP3)
· PRUkid extra(KIDS2)
· PRUlink optimiser plus(POP2)
PRUlink investlife(IL1)
· Investment Plus (INVP)
Please note, PRUlink capital investment plan (PCI) is in compliance with the new regulatory requirements and
will continue to be available for sale on or after 1 January 2015.
To comply with the new regulatory requirements, please note that all completed applications* for PLIP,
RP3, KIDS2, POP2, IL1 and any traditional plans attached with INVP must reach the Cashier Office no
later than 16:00 on 31 December 2014 (the last submission date). All New Business premium and
outstanding supporting documents (if any) must be submitted as soon as possible for policy issue. The
Company will cancel all unsuccessful applications by 31 January 2015 (the last issue date).
For any addition of INVP rider, the completed application* must reach relevant PA Drop-In Box before
14:00 on 31 December 2014 (the last submission date). All outstanding premiums and documents (if any)
must be submitted as soon as possible for company approval. The Company will cancel all unsuccessful
applications by 31 January 2015 (the last issue date).
* Complete application means:
(1) Application Form / Application for Change in Policy and all other relevant application documents are properly signed and
completed; and
(2) Sales illustration must be printed and duly signed on or before 31 December 2014.
To meet customer demand for ILAS products, PLIP and POP2 will be revamped and the new products will be
available in January 2015 subject to regulatory approval. Details will be announced later.
Best regards,
Anthony Shaw
Chief Officer, Marketing & Customer Service

收件人:
所有營業顧問
副本致:
所有區域經理及以上、所有高級經理及以上
通告
：
撤銷投資相連壽險計劃
為保障客戶的權益及確保香港保險業界投資相連壽險業務的質素,保險業監理處對保險業務C類別已發出最新指
引(GN15),指引將於2015年1月1日生效。最新指引的主要範圍包括提供最少保單戶口價值105%的身故賠償,
確保對客戶的收費合理,適當的佣金機制及相關披露。
我們現時的投資相連壽險計劃並不符合保險業監理處最新指引(GN15)內的新要求。因此,本公司將於
2015年1月1日撤銷以下計劃,並將於同日從建議書系統中刪除有關計劃。
「運籌」晉景投資計劃(PLIP)
尊尚退休寶計劃(RP3)
● 俊傑尚盛計劃(KIDS2)
● 「運籌」優越投資計劃(POP2)
●
「投資創富」保障計劃(IL1)
投資寶(INVP)
「鴻圖駿境」投資計劃(PCI)已符合新的規管要求,所以在2015年1月1日起可繼續銷售。
請注意:為符合新的規管要求,所有完整的PLIP, RP3, KIDS2, POP2, IL1及INVP(附加於傳統計劃)的投保
申請文件*,必須於2014年12月31日下午四時前(最後遞交日期)交到公司繳費處。為繕發保單,所有新保費及
其他補充文件(如有)必須盡快遞交。本公司會於2015年1月31日(最後繕發日期)後取消所有未完成的申請。
有關新增申請INVP附加保障的完整申請文件* 必須於2014年12月31日下午二時前(最後遞交日期)放入保單行
政部投遞箱。所有保費及其他補充文件(如有)必須盡快遞交。本公司會於2015年1月31日(最後繕發日期)後
取消所有未完成的INVP附加保障的新增申請。
為滿足客戶對投資相連壽險計劃的需求,我們將於2015年1月(視乎監管機構審批情況而定)推出改良版的PLIP
及POP2。詳情將於稍後公布。
*
完整的申請文件指:
(1) 已填寫完整及正確簽署之人壽保險申請書/ 保單更改申請表及所有其他有關之申請文件;及
(2) 附有有效的建議書,且有關建議書必須於2014年12月31日或之前列印及簽署
請與有關同事分享上述資訊。
首席市場拓展及客戶服務總監
邵安龍 謹啟

所有營業顧問
副本致:
所有區域經理及以上、所有高級經理及以上
通告
：
撤銷投資相連壽險計劃
為保障客戶的權益及確保香港保險業界投資相連壽險業務的質素,保險業監理處對保險業務C類別已發出最新指
引(GN15),指引將於2015年1月1日生效。最新指引的主要範圍包括提供最少保單戶口價值105%的身故賠償,
確保對客戶的收費合理,適當的佣金機制及相關披露。
我們現時的投資相連壽險計劃並不符合保險業監理處最新指引(GN15)內的新要求。因此,本公司將於
2015年1月1日撤銷以下計劃,並將於同日從建議書系統中刪除有關計劃。
「運籌」晉景投資計劃(PLIP)
尊尚退休寶計劃(RP3)
● 俊傑尚盛計劃(KIDS2)
● 「運籌」優越投資計劃(POP2)
●
「投資創富」保障計劃(IL1)
投資寶(INVP)
「鴻圖駿境」投資計劃(PCI)已符合新的規管要求,所以在2015年1月1日起可繼續銷售。
請注意:為符合新的規管要求,所有完整的PLIP, RP3, KIDS2, POP2, IL1及INVP(附加於傳統計劃)的投保
申請文件*,必須於2014年12月31日下午四時前(最後遞交日期)交到公司繳費處。為繕發保單,所有新保費及
其他補充文件(如有)必須盡快遞交。本公司會於2015年1月31日(最後繕發日期)後取消所有未完成的申請。
有關新增申請INVP附加保障的完整申請文件* 必須於2014年12月31日下午二時前(最後遞交日期)放入保單行
政部投遞箱。所有保費及其他補充文件(如有)必須盡快遞交。本公司會於2015年1月31日(最後繕發日期)後
取消所有未完成的INVP附加保障的新增申請。
為滿足客戶對投資相連壽險計劃的需求,我們將於2015年1月(視乎監管機構審批情況而定)推出改良版的PLIP
及POP2。詳情將於稍後公布。
*
完整的申請文件指:
(1) 已填寫完整及正確簽署之人壽保險申請書/ 保單更改申請表及所有其他有關之申請文件;及
(2) 附有有效的建議書,且有關建議書必須於2014年12月31日或之前列印及簽署
請與有關同事分享上述資訊。
首席市場拓展及客戶服務總監
邵安龍 謹啟

的現有指定人士/無行為能力選項之現有指定人士/特定計劃下就親子保費豁免保障的已登記保單持有人配偶。若保單持有人以圖章
蓋印或指紋簽署,必須有兩位見證人。見證人之個人資料只會用於處理本申請及確認此表格簽署人的身份之用。

LAPA/DATTPM (03/22)R
9
DATTPM0109Part X 第十部 Policy Replacement Declaration 轉保聲明
In order to subsidize the purchase of your new life insurance policy, are you using, or do you intend to use the funds arising from the existing life insurance
policy (or multiple life insurance policies) (collectively "existing life insurance policy(ies)") that you have or had, or any savings made by reducing the premium
payable under your existing life insurance policy in the past or next 12 months, by means of the followings:
閣下是否打算在未來緊接的十二個月內,或已經在過去的十二個月內,使用或打算使用 閣下現時或曾經持有的一張或多張人壽保單
(下稱“現有人壽保單”)透過下列方式取得資金或節省保費,以資助購買新人壽保單所需的費用?
1. Reducing the total cash value, sum assured, other policy value(s) or policy right(s) of the existing life insurance policy(ies), by exercising the policy right
under the existing life insurance policy(ies) (including wholly or partially withdrawal, wholly or partially surrender);
2. Taking out a policy loan from the existing life insurance policy (ies);
3. Reducing, suspending or non-payment of premium under the existing life insurance policy(ies), including switching to reduced paid-up or extended term
insurance by automatic operation of the terms and conditions, exercising automatic premium loan, premium holiday or lapsation, etc .; or
4. Transferring or assigning ownership of existing life insurance policy(ies).
1. 行使現有人壽保單內之權利,包括提取全部或部份保單款項、退保或部份退保等,以減少現有人壽保單的現金價值總額、保險金額、
其他保單價值或保單權益;
2. 從現有人壽保單中提取保單貸款;
3. 減少、暫停或終止支付現有人壽保單之保費,包括藉保單條款及細則自動運作的情況下使其變為減額清繳保單或展期保單、執行自動
保費貸款、執行保費假期條款或保單失效等;或
4.
更改現有人壽保單的擁有權或將其轉讓。
□
Yes (Please complete the Life Insurance Policy Replacement Declaration, read carefully and sign the Declaration below)
是(請填寫《人壽保險客戶轉保聲明書》並詳閱下列聲明及簽署)
□
No (Please read carefully and sign the Declaration below)
否(請詳閱下列聲明及簽署)
Warning: Please answer the above questions carefully. Making changes or replacing your existing life insurance policy(ies) with your new life
insurance policy (i.e. policy replacement) may not be in your best interest. To protect your interests, you should approach the insurer of your
existing life insurance policy(ies) to obtain up to date information on your existing life insurance policy(ies) and your insurance intermediary
should assist you to evaluate and compare your existing and new life insurance policies. If your above answer is "Yes", your insurance intermediary
must assist you to complete the "Life Insurance Policy Replacement Declaration" and explain to you the implications and disadvantages of
financial, insurability and claims eligibility of such policy replacement.
警告:請 閣下慎重回答以上問題。以新人壽保單變更或取替現有人壽保單(即轉保)未必符合 閣下的最佳利益。為保障 閣下之利益,
閣下應向現有人壽保單的保險公司索取最新資料,而有關保險中介人亦應協助 閣下對現有人壽保單及新人壽保單進行評估及比較。倘
閣下上述回覆為“是”,有關保險中介人必須協助 閣下填寫《人壽保險客戶轉保聲明書》及解釋有關轉保對 閣下的財務、受保資格及
索償資格所帶來之影響及弊端。

DATTPM0109Part X 第十部 Policy Replacement Declaration 轉保聲明
In order to subsidize the purchase of your new life insurance policy, are you using, or do you intend to use the funds arising from the existing life insurance
policy (or multiple life insurance policies) (collectively "existing life insurance policy(ies)") that you have or had, or any savings made by reducing the premium
payable under your existing life insurance policy in the past or next 12 months, by means of the followings:
閣下是否打算在未來緊接的十二個月內,或已經在過去的十二個月內,使用或打算使用 閣下現時或曾經持有的一張或多張人壽保單
(下稱“現有人壽保單”)透過下列方式取得資金或節省保費,以資助購買新人壽保單所需的費用?
1. Reducing the total cash value, sum assured, other policy value(s) or policy right(s) of the existing life insurance policy(ies), by exercising the policy right
under the existing life insurance policy(ies) (including wholly or partially withdrawal, wholly or partially surrender);
2. Taking out a policy loan from the existing life insurance policy (ies);
3. Reducing, suspending or non-payment of premium under the existing life insurance policy(ies), including switching to reduced paid-up or extended term
insurance by automatic operation of the terms and conditions, exercising automatic premium loan, premium holiday or lapsation, etc .; or
4. Transferring or assigning ownership of existing life insurance policy(ies).
1. 行使現有人壽保單內之權利,包括提取全部或部份保單款項、退保或部份退保等,以減少現有人壽保單的現金價值總額、保險金額、
其他保單價值或保單權益;
2. 從現有人壽保單中提取保單貸款;
3. 減少、暫停或終止支付現有人壽保單之保費,包括藉保單條款及細則自動運作的情況下使其變為減額清繳保單或展期保單、執行自動
保費貸款、執行保費假期條款或保單失效等;或
4.
更改現有人壽保單的擁有權或將其轉讓。
□
Yes (Please complete the Life Insurance Policy Replacement Declaration, read carefully and sign the Declaration below)
是(請填寫《人壽保險客戶轉保聲明書》並詳閱下列聲明及簽署)
□
No (Please read carefully and sign the Declaration below)
否(請詳閱下列聲明及簽署)
Warning: Please answer the above questions carefully. Making changes or replacing your existing life insurance policy(ies) with your new life
insurance policy (i.e. policy replacement) may not be in your best interest. To protect your interests, you should approach the insurer of your
existing life insurance policy(ies) to obtain up to date information on your existing life insurance policy(ies) and your insurance intermediary
should assist you to evaluate and compare your existing and new life insurance policies. If your above answer is "Yes", your insurance intermediary
must assist you to complete the "Life Insurance Policy Replacement Declaration" and explain to you the implications and disadvantages of
financial, insurability and claims eligibility of such policy replacement.
警告:請 閣下慎重回答以上問題。以新人壽保單變更或取替現有人壽保單(即轉保)未必符合 閣下的最佳利益。為保障 閣下之利益,
閣下應向現有人壽保單的保險公司索取最新資料,而有關保險中介人亦應協助 閣下對現有人壽保單及新人壽保單進行評估及比較。倘
閣下上述回覆為“是”,有關保險中介人必須協助 閣下填寫《人壽保險客戶轉保聲明書》及解釋有關轉保對 閣下的財務、受保資格及
索償資格所帶來之影響及弊端。

我們會不時更新我們的私隱通知,並建議閣下瀏覽本公司網站以了解該私隱通知。該私隱通知可在本公司網站
[https://www.prudential.com.hk/scws/pages/tc/privacy-policy/index.html〕 上查閱。閣下填妥並繼續提交本表格,即表示閣下確認已閱讀並理解
本收集個人資料聲明。
業務合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商、提供行政、電信、電腦、信息技術、數據處理及儲存、客戶滿意度分析、支付、印刷、贖回或其
他服務予我們,以使我們能夠經營我們業務,會計師、審計師、IT服務和平台供應商、保險中介機構、再保險承保人、投資經理、代理、
退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人、核准的第三方金融和保險產品供應商以及我們的法律顧問。
營銷合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商提供行政、電信、電腦、支付、印刷、第三方獎賞/會員/優惠計劃、醫療/健康/保健相關產品、
贖回或其他服務,以使我們能夠經營我們業務、保險中介、退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人和核准的第三方金融
和保險產品供應商。

蔡川艾 謹啓From : Benny Tsoi
Date : 3 January 2014
PRUDENTIAL
英 國 保 誠
To : All Financial Consultants
cc : JT, JL, AS, ADE, EW, EC, BC, EK, SL
Re : Additional Frequently Asked Questions ("FAQ") on Updated Requirements relating to the Sale of
ILAS to Enhance Customer Protection
The Hong Kong Federation of Insurers ("HKFI") has recently added the Frequently Asked Questions ("FAQ") on Updated
Requirements Relating to the Sale of Investment Linked Assurance Scheme ("ILAS") to enhance customer protection and
the Product Sales Flow. The scope of this FAQ is relating to the purposes of buying ILAS plans as stated on the Financial
Needs Analysis ("FNA") and the Important Facts Statement and the Applicant's Declarations ("IFS"). Such change is for
the sake of safe guarding the product suitability of a customer, while clarifying the customer purpose of taking up an ILAS
product can minimize misunderstanding during the initial product proposing stage.
In order to ensure that our company follows the HKFI's best practice of proposing ILAS plans to clients, all the Financial
Consultants should adhere to the following suggestion of answers on FNA & IFS for the following scenario of cases no
later than 24 Jan 2014. Please ensure consistency between the options of the FNA and IFS; and any other purposes
written by the applicants are not recommended, else, the application with inappropriate answers will be held pending and
require re-submission of relevant forms.
ILAS basic plan
ILAS FNA (Q1)
Please tick E
IFS (Basic Plan)
IFS (Top up)
New Business
(1) ILAS basic plan only
1 A. Life Protection
D. Investment
Minor Protection +
Investment
Not Applicable
(2) ILAS + RTU / LTU
After policy
issuance

Investment
(please use the IFS of top up)
P.S. ILAS : Investment linked assurance scheme, RTU : Regular Top-up, LTU : Lump Sum Top-up, INVP : Investment Plus rider
For the procedure details, Product Sales Flow and HKFI's circular on the issues, please refer to respective AFS's
powerpoint and HKFI's Codes and Regulation which are placed at PIL > Agency Operations > Agency Compliance >
Additional FAQ on Updated Requirement Relating to the Sale of ILAS to enhance Customer Protection - FNA. The
updated FAQ can be accessed through the HKFI website: http://www.hkfi.org.hk/pdf/en/download/e FAQ.pdf.
If you are interested in the topics, you are highly encouraged to enroll at IMCS for the "2014 Market Outlook Investment
Seminar" being held at KITEC on 8 Jan 2014. Our AFS will have detailed briefing about this issue during this episode.
Wish you happy and healthy in 2014. All the best and good selling!
With best regards,
Benny Tsoi
Deputy Chief Agency Officer
Agency Administration Department

results.title_name_tc: 交銀信託提供之保單信託服務
results.content_en:
st application with Bank of Communications Trustee (thereafter
shortened as "BOCT")
b) Obtain confirmation with BOCT by issuing Trust Deeds, usually around 3 -4
weeks.
c) Agents will be notified by BOCT and should prepare the policy change form,
i.e. Beneficiary Appointment Form with Policyowner's signature to
Prudential accordingly, pending attachments as specified in item 3 below. The
workflow shall follow the existing practice as set forth by Life Administration.
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)d) The required documents (see item 3 below) will be submitted by BOCT to Life
Administration and the Company reserves the right to call for additional
documents for incomplete cases.
e) Upon completion, Company will issue confirmation notices to the Policyowner
(with cc copy to agent).
f) Future correspondence will be sent to original Policyowner subsequent to the
confirmation as usual (as there is no change in policy ownership).
2. Minimum Requirement for setting up policy trust with BOCT
- By Sum Insured: Not less than HK$3 Million (including policy issued with
Prudential and other companies)
- By Assets: Not less than HK$3 Million (including cash value of policy and other
tangibles assets and properties)
- Discretion will be exercised by Bank of Communication Trustee if the above
amount is not met.
- Applying the usual practice of excluding US citizens from the purchase of
investment linked plan, the same restriction will be applied to the discretionary
beneficiaries as set out in the Trust, plus the exclusion for Japanese citizens for all
plans.
3. Documents required for submission to Life Administration
(in accordance with the best practice laid down in the guidance notes of OCI)
- Trust Deed containing Settlor name and beneficiaries name in full
- Relationship declaration of the beneficiaries as contained in the Trust Application
Form or any other supplementary sheet
- Nationality of the Settlor and the beneficiaries (US citizenship will be excluded
for linked policies, Japanese citizenship for all policies, see item 2 above)
4. Responsibilities
4.1 Agent's role
- Agent shall act a referrer and should play no active role in the trust application.
Agents are strongly advised not to give advice on the type of trust and the
consequence, and shall from time to time, refer the client to consult sales staff
from BOCT or their own lawyer if in doubt.
- Agent has NO obligation to sign as witness during the trust application.
- Agent can decide on his own whether to join the sales meeting with the service
provider or not.
- Agent has NO commission from Bank of Communication Trustee in any
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)

results.title_name_en: Addition/Increase of Regular Top-up Premium (RTU) / Addition of Lump Sum Top-up Premium
results.title_name_tc: 附加/增加定期額外投資保費或附加一次過額外投資保費
results.content_en:
PRUDENTIAL
英 國 保 誠
From :
Anthony Shaw
Date :
8 December, 2014
To :
All Financial Consultants
CC :
Regional Managers & up, Senior Managers & up
Re :
Withdrawal of ILAS Products
To help protect the rights of customers and ensure that the quality of ILAS business issued by the Hong Kong
insurance industry is as high as possible, the Office of the Commissioner of Insurance (OCI) has issued a
Guidance Note on Underwriting Class C Business (GN15), which will be effective on 1 January 2015. The
major scope of GN15 includes requiring a minimum death benefit of 105% of the account value, ensuring fees
and charges are fair to customers and remuneration structure is appropriate with proper disclosure.
Our current ILAS products do not conform to the new standards contained in GN15. In view of this, the
Company will withdraw the following products with effect from 1 January 2015 i.e. these products will be
removed from the PRUcompass on 1 January 2015:
· PRUlink investment plan(PLIP)
PRUretirement extra(RP3)
· PRUkid extra(KIDS2)
· PRUlink optimiser plus(POP2)
PRUlink investlife(IL1)
· Investment Plus (INVP)
Please note, PRUlink capital investment plan (PCI) is in compliance with the new regulatory requirements and
will continue to be available for sale on or after 1 January 2015.
To comply with the new regulatory requirements, please note that all completed applications* for PLIP,
RP3, KIDS2, POP2, IL1 and any traditional plans attached with INVP must reach the Cashier Office no
later than 16:00 on 31 December 2014 (the last submission date). All New Business premium and
outstanding supporting documents (if any) must be submitted as soon as possible for policy issue. The
Company will cancel all unsuccessful applications by 31 January 2015 (the last issue date).
For any addition of INVP rider, the completed application* must reach relevant PA Drop-In Box before
14:00 on 31 December 2014 (the last submission date). All outstanding premiums and documents (if any)
must be submitted as soon as possible for company approval. The Company will cancel all unsuccessful
applications by 31 January 2015 (the last issue date).
* Complete application means:
(1) Application Form / Application for Change in Policy and all other relevant application documents are properly signed and
completed; and
(2) Sales illustration must be printed and duly signed on or before 31 December 2014.
To meet customer demand for ILAS products, PLIP and POP2 will be revamped and the new products will be
available in January 2015 subject to regulatory approval. Details will be announced later.
Best regards,
Anthony Shaw
Chief Officer, Marketing & Customer Service

Guidance Note on Underwriting Class C Business (GN15), which will be effective on 1 January 2015. The
major scope of GN15 includes requiring a minimum death benefit of 105% of the account value, ensuring fees
and charges are fair to customers and remuneration structure is appropriate with proper disclosure.
Our current ILAS products do not conform to the new standards contained in GN15. In view of this, the
Company will withdraw the following products with effect from 1 January 2015 i.e. these products will be
removed from the PRUcompass on 1 January 2015:
· PRUlink investment plan(PLIP)
PRUretirement extra(RP3)
· PRUkid extra(KIDS2)
· PRUlink optimiser plus(POP2)
PRUlink investlife(IL1)
· Investment Plus (INVP)
Please note, PRUlink capital investment plan (PCI) is in compliance with the new regulatory requirements and
will continue to be available for sale on or after 1 January 2015.
To comply with the new regulatory requirements, please note that all completed applications* for PLIP,
RP3, KIDS2, POP2, IL1 and any traditional plans attached with INVP must reach the Cashier Office no
later than 16:00 on 31 December 2014 (the last submission date). All New Business premium and
outstanding supporting documents (if any) must be submitted as soon as possible for policy issue. The
Company will cancel all unsuccessful applications by 31 January 2015 (the last issue date).
For any addition of INVP rider, the completed application* must reach relevant PA Drop-In Box before
14:00 on 31 December 2014 (the last submission date). All outstanding premiums and documents (if any)
must be submitted as soon as possible for company approval. The Company will cancel all unsuccessful
applications by 31 January 2015 (the last issue date).
* Complete application means:
(1) Application Form / Application for Change in Policy and all other relevant application documents are properly signed and
completed; and
(2) Sales illustration must be printed and duly signed on or before 31 December 2014.
To meet customer demand for ILAS products, PLIP and POP2 will be revamped and the new products will be
available in January 2015 subject to regulatory approval. Details will be announced later.
Best regards,
Anthony Shaw
Chief Officer, Marketing & Customer Service

Section III: Suitability Declaration
丙部:合適性聲明
I ("Policyowner") understand and agree that (tick one only):
本人(“保單持有人”)明白並同意(只可選一項):
A
the features and risk level of the ILAS policy and my selected mix of underlying investment choices are suitable for me
based on my disclosed current needs and risk profile , etc. as indicated in the Financial Needs Analysis and Risk Profile
Questionnaire.
根據本人於「財務需要分析」及「風險承擔能力問卷」所披露的現時需要及投風險承擔能力等資料,此投連壽險保單
之特點及其風險水平,及本人所選擇的相關投資選項組合均適合本人。
OR 或
B
despite the fact that the features and/or risk level of the ILAS policy and/or my selected mix of underlying investment
choices may not be suitable for me based on my disclosed current needs and risk profile , etc. as indicated in the Financial
Needs Analysis and Risk Profile Questionnaire, I confirm that it is my intention and desire to proceed with my application(s)
as explained below:
儘管根據本人於「財務需要分析」及「風險承擔能力問卷」所披露的現時需要及風險承擔能力等資料,此投連壽險
保單之特點及/ 或風險水平及/ 或本人所選擇的相關投資選項組合可能並不適合本人,但本人確認基於下述原因,
本人打算及意欲申請此投連壽險保單:
(If Box B is ticked, Applicant must complete explanation in this box.)
(如選擇「B」項,申請人必須於此欄內提供原因。)
I acknowledge I should not purchase any top-up premiums and/or the selected mix of underlying investment choices unless I
understand these and their suitability has been explained to me and that the final decision is mine.
本人確認,除非本人清楚了解此投連壽險保單及/或所選擇的相關投資項目選項組合,並已獲解釋此投連壽險保單的合適性;
否則,本人不應購買任何額外投資保費及/或選取相關的投資選項組合。本人擁有最終的決定權。
I understand that the authorized insurer will retain copy(ies) of the completed Financial Needs Analysis and Risk Profile Questionnaire
for verification purpose.
本人明白授權保險人將保留已填妥的「財務需要分析」及「風險承擔能力問卷」副本作核實之用途。

Notes 註釋:
1.
In this Statement & Declaration, "I" refers to Policyowner. The singular shall include the plural; the word "I" shall include "we"; & the word "my"
shall include "our". For joint Policyowners, all Policyowners must sign all sections.
就《重要資料聲明書》及《申請人聲明書》而言,「本人」指保單持有人,單數等同複數;「本人」包括「我們」的涵義;及「本人的」
包括「我們的」的涵義。若為聯名保單持有人,所有保單持有人必須在所有部分內簽署。
2.
The Policyowner(s) are required to inform the licensed insurance intermediary or us (the authorized insurer) if there is any material change of
information provided in these Declarations before the approval of your application.
若《重要資料聲明書》及《申請人聲明書》上填報的資料有任何重大變更,閣下在申請批核完成前必須通知閣下的持牌保險中介人或本公司
(授權保險人)。

TOP-UP
B
Section III: Suitability Declaration
丙部:合適性聲明
I ("Policyowner") understand and agree that (tick one only):
本人(“保單持有人”)明白並同意(只可選一項):
A
the features and risk level of the ILAS policy and my selected mix of underlying investment choices are suitable for me
based on my disclosed current needs and risk profile , etc. as indicated in the Financial Needs Analysis and Risk Profile
Questionnaire.
根據本人於「財務需要分析」及「風險承擔能力問卷」所披露的現時需要及投風險承擔能力等資料,此投連壽險保單
之特點及其風險水平,及本人所選擇的相關投資選項組合均適合本人。
OR 或
B
despite the fact that the features and/or risk level of the ILAS policy and/or my selected mix of underlying investment
choices may not be suitable for me based on my disclosed current needs and risk profile , etc. as indicated in the Financial
Needs Analysis and Risk Profile Questionnaire, I confirm that it is my intention and desire to proceed with my application(s)
as explained below:
儘管根據本人於「財務需要分析」及「風險承擔能力問卷」所披露的現時需要及風險承擔能力等資料,此投連壽險
保單之特點及/ 或風險水平及/ 或本人所選擇的相關投資選項組合可能並不適合本人,但本人確認基於下述原因,
本人打算及意欲申請此投連壽險保單:
(If Box B is ticked, Applicant must complete explanation in this box.)
(如選擇「B」項,申請人必須於此欄內提供原因。)
I acknowledge I should not purchase any top-up premiums and/or the selected mix of underlying investment choices unless I
understand these and their suitability has been explained to me and that the final decision is mine.
本人確認,除非本人清楚了解此投連壽險保單及/或所選擇的相關投資項目選項組合,並已獲解釋此投連壽險保單的合適性;
否則,本人不應購買任何額外投資保費及/或選取相關的投資選項組合。本人擁有最終的決定權。
I understand that the authorized insurer will retain copy(ies) of the completed Financial Needs Analysis and Risk Profile Questionnaire
for verification purpose.
本人明白授權保險人將保留已填妥的「財務需要分析」及「風險承擔能力問卷」副本作核實之用途。

Notes 註釋:
1.
In this Statement & Declaration, "I" refers to Policyowner. The singular shall include the plural; the word "I" shall include "we"; & the word "my"
shall include "our". For joint Policyowners, all Policyowners must sign all sections.
就《重要資料聲明書》及《申請人聲明書》而言,「本人」指保單持有人,單數等同複數;「本人」包括「我們」的涵義;及「本人的」
包括「我們的」的涵義。若為聯名保單持有人,所有保單持有人必須在所有部分內簽署。
2.
The Policyowner(s) are required to inform the licensed insurance intermediary or us (the authorized insurer) if there is any material change of
information provided in these Declarations before the approval of your application.

By ticking this box, you agree that as an international group company, in order to provide insurance-related products or services,
we may need to store and process your personal information outside of mainland China. Please refer to our Privacy Notice
(https://www.prudential.com.hk/en/china-personal-information-protection-law/) for more information.

Important Note 重要提示
1. This form is only applicable to Prime Eternity (PRMESPM) and Prudential Entrust Multi-Currency Plan (TRSTM). 此表格只適用於世譽財富
(PRMESPM) 及保誠信守明天多元貨幣計劃(TRSTM)。
2. (Applicable to Prudential Entrust Multi-Currency Plan only) "Incapacity Option" refers to "Incapacity Option - Benefit Payout" throughout this
form unless otherwise specified. (只適用於保誠信守明天多元貨幣計劃)除非另有說明,此表格上「無行為能力選項」指「無行為能力
選項 -保障支付」。

此表格後30天內交回保誠保險有限公司(澳門分行)(「保誠」,「本公司」或「我們」)處理。
5. Please do not sign on blank or incomplete form. 請勿在空白表格或尚未填妥的表格上簽署。
6. Any changes or amendments in this form must be signed by policyowner ("policyowner" refers to "policy holder" in the policy provisions) in full
signature. 保單持有人須在此表格內任何更改或修改的地方加簽作實。
7. Selection in Part 2 of this form is mandatory; all details in Part 2 and 3 of this form are mandatory for appointment or change of Designated Person.
此表格內的第二部分之選項必須填寫;如委任或更改指定人士,此表格內的第二及第三部分之所有內容必須填寫。
8. Please read and acknowledge all the important notes and declaration of this form. Policyowner MUST sign and date in Part 6 of this form. 0 4
確認此表格內的所有重要提示及聲明,保單持有人必須在此表格第六部分簽署及填寫簽署日期。
9. Please complete the form as instructed, any information written in non-designated blank spaces will not be processed. 請根據此表格之指示填寫
資料,於非指定空白位置填寫的資料恕不受理。
10. As time is required for the review of this form, receipt of this form by financial consultants does not constitute receipt or approval by Prudential. We
shall have the right to reject this application if our requirements are not fulfilled. 由於審核此表格需時,理財顧問收到此表格並不代表保誠
已收到或已批核此表格。若此申請未能符合我們的規定,保誠有權拒絕。
11. In any circumstances, a person who is not a party to the above policy (including but not limited to the life assured or the beneficiary) has no right to
enforce any of the terms of the above policy. 任何不是上述保單某一方的人士或實體(包括但不限於受保人或受益人),在任何情況下
均不能強制執行上述保單的任何條款。

均不能強制執行上述保單的任何條款。

業務合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商、提供行政、電信、電腦、信息技術、數據處理及儲存、客戶滿意度分析、支付、印刷、贖回或其
他服務予我們,以使我們能夠經營我們業務,會計師、審計師、IT服務和平台供應商、保險中介機構、再保險承保人、投資經理、代理、
退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人、核准的第三方金融和保險產品供應商以及我們的法律顧問。

贖回或其他服務,以使我們能夠經營我們業務、保險中介、退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人和核准的第三方金融
和保險產品供應商。

results.title_name_tc: 更改自動保費貸款選項
results.content_en:
PRUDENTIAL
英 國
保 誠本
1
Consultant's Name
顧問姓名:
Division - Agent Code
組別-營業員編號:
Proposal / Policy Number(s)
申請書編號/保單號碼:
Life Proposed / Life Assured's Name
受保人姓名:
Application Form for Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項申請表
Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項
Declaration
聲明
I request to apply Automatic Premium Loan clause to the policy which the amount of premium or premium and levy shall be automatically
deemed to be paid by a premium loan and extend to the premium(s) or premium(s) and levy(ies) for any supplementary benefit(s) when the
Plan is paid up.
本人申請應用自動保費貸款條文於此保單,即保費或保費及徵費將自動以貸款的形式繳交,並延續條文於本計劃已繳清所有保費時的附加保障之保費
或保費及徵費。
I declare that I have read and confirm understanding of the important notes below.
本人在此聲明本人已閱讀並確認明白下列注意事項之內容。
Important Notes
注意事項
1. We shall charge you interest on the Automatic Premium Loan(s) starting from the date when the respective Automatic Premium Loan(s)
is incurred. We shall determine the interest rate charged on the Automatic Premium Loan(s).
本公司將會由自動保費貸款日期開始收取自動保費貸款的利息,有關利率將由本公司釐訂。
2. The policy will be automatically terminated once the total outstanding loan amount (including interest) owing to us under your policy
exceeds stated percentage on Policy Contract of the guaranteed cash value of your policy minus all Advanced Claims being paid and / or
payable of this Plan.
本計劃將在 閣下的保單所欠本公司之未償還總金額(包括利息)超過合約訂明比率之保單保證現金價值扣除於本計劃須支付及/或已付訖的預
支賠償總額時立即終止。
I/We declare that I/we have read and confirm understanding of the above content.
本人/吾等在此聲明本人/吾等已閱讀並確認明白上述之內容。
Day
日
Month
月
Year
年
Signature of Proposer / Policyowner
(if other than the Life Proposed / Life
Assured)
投保人/保單持有人簽署(如投保人/保單持有
人與受保人同為一人,可免簽署此欄)
Signature of Life Proposed / Life Assured
(who has attained age 18 or above)
受保人簽署(適用於十八歲或以上的受保人)
Signature of Consultant as Witness
顧問 ( 即見證人 ) 簽署
Name 姓名:
Two witnesses are required if signature chop or fingerprint is used to sign. 若以圖章蓋印或指紋簽署,須有兩位見證人。
Please DO NOT sign on BLANK form. 請勿在空白表格上簽署。

2014年12月29日

所有區域經理及以上、所有高級經理及以上
通告
：
有關銷售投資相連壽險計劃之更新及有關安排
承接2014年12月8日發出關於撤銷投資相連壽險計劃之通告,我們現有以下更新:
1. 延長「運籌」晉景投資計劃(PLIP)及「運籌」優越投資計劃(POP2)
根據我們較早前發出之通告,為符合保險業監理處對保險業務C類別最新指引(GN15)之要求,PLIP
及 POP2 將會作出改良。鑑於上述改良版的新產品仍在保險業監理處及香港證監會最後審批中,及有
待正式批准。因此,現時的PLIP及POP2之銷售期將延長至以下最新日期:
PLIP & POP2
RP3/ KIDS2/ IL1/ INVP
最後遞交日期
2015年1月19日下午四時(更新)
2014年12月 31 日下午四時
(INVP: 下午二時)
最後繕發日期*
2015年2月19日(更新)
2015年1月31日
*本公司會於最後繕發日期後取消所有未完成的申請
請注意PLIP之額外首年獎賞推廣將同時延長至2015年1月19日止。
我們預計改良版的PLIP及POP2將於2015年1月20日推出,新產品的詳情及培訓安排,將於稍後公佈。
2. 額外投資保費(定期或一次過)之最新監管要求
為確保符合最新監管要求(GN15),由2015年1月1日起,凡於現有保單上申請定期或一次過額外投資
保費,客戶必須提交完整的理財需要分析表格(FNA)。此外,客戶由2015年1月1日起必須填妥新的重
要資料聲明書及申請人聲明書(IFS)。新版本包括中介人的酬勞及適合性聲明,並
由2015年1月1日起可於 PA000015 PIL位置下載。請依從下表各情況之建議答案填寫FNA及IFS。

有關銷售投資相連壽險計劃之更新及有關安排
承接2014年12月8日發出關於撤銷投資相連壽險計劃之通告,我們現有以下更新:
1. 延長「運籌」晉景投資計劃(PLIP)及「運籌」優越投資計劃(POP2)
根據我們較早前發出之通告,為符合保險業監理處對保險業務C類別最新指引(GN15)之要求,PLIP
及 POP2 將會作出改良。鑑於上述改良版的新產品仍在保險業監理處及香港證監會最後審批中,及有
待正式批准。因此,現時的PLIP及POP2之銷售期將延長至以下最新日期:

蔡川艾 謹啓From : Benny Tsoi
Date : 3 January 2014
PRUDENTIAL
英 國 保 誠
To : All Financial Consultants
cc : JT, JL, AS, ADE, EW, EC, BC, EK, SL
Re : Additional Frequently Asked Questions ("FAQ") on Updated Requirements relating to the Sale of
ILAS to Enhance Customer Protection
The Hong Kong Federation of Insurers ("HKFI") has recently added the Frequently Asked Questions ("FAQ") on Updated
Requirements Relating to the Sale of Investment Linked Assurance Scheme ("ILAS") to enhance customer protection and
the Product Sales Flow. The scope of this FAQ is relating to the purposes of buying ILAS plans as stated on the Financial
Needs Analysis ("FNA") and the Important Facts Statement and the Applicant's Declarations ("IFS"). Such change is for
the sake of safe guarding the product suitability of a customer, while clarifying the customer purpose of taking up an ILAS
product can minimize misunderstanding during the initial product proposing stage.
In order to ensure that our company follows the HKFI's best practice of proposing ILAS plans to clients, all the Financial
Consultants should adhere to the following suggestion of answers on FNA & IFS for the following scenario of cases no
later than 24 Jan 2014. Please ensure consistency between the options of the FNA and IFS; and any other purposes
written by the applicants are not recommended, else, the application with inappropriate answers will be held pending and
require re-submission of relevant forms.
ILAS basic plan
ILAS FNA (Q1)
Please tick E
IFS (Basic Plan)
IFS (Top up)
New Business
(1) ILAS basic plan only
1 A. Life Protection
D. Investment
Minor Protection +
Investment
Not Applicable
(2) ILAS + RTU / LTU

P.S. ILAS : Investment linked assurance scheme, RTU : Regular Top-up, LTU : Lump Sum Top-up, INVP : Investment Plus rider
For the procedure details, Product Sales Flow and HKFI's circular on the issues, please refer to respective AFS's
powerpoint and HKFI's Codes and Regulation which are placed at PIL > Agency Operations > Agency Compliance >
Additional FAQ on Updated Requirement Relating to the Sale of ILAS to enhance Customer Protection - FNA. The
updated FAQ can be accessed through the HKFI website: http://www.hkfi.org.hk/pdf/en/download/e FAQ.pdf.
If you are interested in the topics, you are highly encouraged to enroll at IMCS for the "2014 Market Outlook Investment
Seminar" being held at KITEC on 8 Jan 2014. Our AFS will have detailed briefing about this issue during this episode.
Wish you happy and healthy in 2014. All the best and good selling!
With best regards,
Benny Tsoi
Deputy Chief Agency Officer
Agency Administration Department

results.content_en:
st application with Bank of Communications Trustee (thereafter
shortened as "BOCT")
b) Obtain confirmation with BOCT by issuing Trust Deeds, usually around 3 -4
weeks.
c) Agents will be notified by BOCT and should prepare the policy change form,
i.e. Beneficiary Appointment Form with Policyowner's signature to
Prudential accordingly, pending attachments as specified in item 3 below. The
workflow shall follow the existing practice as set forth by Life Administration.
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)d) The required documents (see item 3 below) will be submitted by BOCT to Life
Administration and the Company reserves the right to call for additional
documents for incomplete cases.
e) Upon completion, Company will issue confirmation notices to the Policyowner
(with cc copy to agent).
f) Future correspondence will be sent to original Policyowner subsequent to the
confirmation as usual (as there is no change in policy ownership).
2. Minimum Requirement for setting up policy trust with BOCT
- By Sum Insured: Not less than HK$3 Million (including policy issued with
Prudential and other companies)
- By Assets: Not less than HK$3 Million (including cash value of policy and other
tangibles assets and properties)
- Discretion will be exercised by Bank of Communication Trustee if the above
amount is not met.
- Applying the usual practice of excluding US citizens from the purchase of
investment linked plan, the same restriction will be applied to the discretionary
beneficiaries as set out in the Trust, plus the exclusion for Japanese citizens for all
plans.
3. Documents required for submission to Life Administration
(in accordance with the best practice laid down in the guidance notes of OCI)
- Trust Deed containing Settlor name and beneficiaries name in full
- Relationship declaration of the beneficiaries as contained in the Trust Application
Form or any other supplementary sheet
- Nationality of the Settlor and the beneficiaries (US citizenship will be excluded
for linked policies, Japanese citizenship for all policies, see item 2 above)
4. Responsibilities
4.1 Agent's role
- Agent shall act a referrer and should play no active role in the trust application.
Agents are strongly advised not to give advice on the type of trust and the
consequence, and shall from time to time, refer the client to consult sales staff
from BOCT or their own lawyer if in doubt.
- Agent has NO obligation to sign as witness during the trust application.
- Agent can decide on his own whether to join the sales meeting with the service
provider or not.
- Agent has NO commission from Bank of Communication Trustee in any
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)

results.title_name_en: Employees’ Compensation Insurance (ECI)– Wageroll Reporting (Effective 1 January 2019)
results.title_name_tc: 僱員補償保險的申報工資指引（適用由二零一九年一月一日起生效的新保單及續保保單）
results.content_en:
n)
➢
➢
Employee information (e.g. number of employees, part time / full time,
permanent / temporary work, work location, occupation / position, actual
earnings, requirement to work or take business trips outside of Hong Kong, etc.)
Past claims records
➢
Wageroll records (including MPF contributions records in the previous 12 months
/ relevant tax returns / accounting records)
4.
If I have questions, who should I talk to?
For enquiries, please contact your insurance intermediaries or insurers.
12Industry
5.
The current mechanism of wageroll declaration has been in operation for many
years. Why is it necessary to make a change now?
There has been no changes on the reporting requirement of employees'
information. Under the Employees Compensation Ordinance, employers are
obliged to take out ECI policies for its employees. When doing so, they must
observe the policy terms and conditions and report the actual number of
employees and earnings amount. The Standardized Practice only serves to
reinforce such requirements, which will reflect the actual risks borne by insurers,
thus ensuring employers and employees are protected accordingly.
6.
If employers are uncooperative and refuse to provide the relevant documents,
what should insurance intermediaries do?
Insurance intermediaries should explain to employers that customers are liable
for submitting the relevant documents to insurers for policy application. They
should also remind the employers to act in utmost good faith in the course of the
application process and provide the insurers with true and accurate information.
If employers commented that such documents were not required in the past,
intermediaries should make it clear that the Standardized Practice is now
applicable to the entire insurance industry. That is, the employers are required
to provide the same information regardless of whether they buy the ECI from
insurance agents or brokers.
7.
Would an insurance intermediary be considered breaching the conduct
requirement if he / she fails to take all reasonable steps to obtain the necessary
information / documents from the employers?
Under the prevailing requirements, insurance intermediaries are required to
conduct business in good faith and with integrity at all times. It is also the
insurance intermediaries' obligation to explain to employers that customers are
held responsible for the information provided to the insurer. If the employer
provides the insurer with false information, this may leave the employer open to
legal action by the insurer for recovery of monies previously paid by the insurer
to indemnify any claim under the policy. If an intermediary instigates an
employer to submit false information or fails to do his best in reminding the
employer to submit the required information, he may be breaching the relevant
conduct requirements.
13
results.content_tc:
n)
➢
➢
Employee information (e.g. number of employees, part time / full time,
permanent / temporary work, work location, occupation / position, actual
earnings, requirement to work or take business trips outside of Hong Kong, etc.)
Past claims records
➢
Wageroll records (including MPF contributions records in the previous 12 months
/ relevant tax returns / accounting records)
4.
If I have questions, who should I talk to?
For enquiries, please contact your insurance intermediaries or insurers.
12Industry
5.
The current mechanism of wageroll declaration has been in operation for many
years. Why is it necessary to make a change now?
There has been no changes on the reporting requirement of employees'
information. Under the Employees Compensation Ordinance, employers are
obliged to take out ECI policies for its employees. When doing so, they must
observe the policy terms and conditions and report the actual number of
employees and earnings amount. The Standardized Practice only serves to
reinforce such requirements, which will reflect the actual risks borne by insurers,
thus ensuring employers and employees are protected accordingly.
6.
If employers are uncooperative and refuse to provide the relevant documents,
what should insurance intermediaries do?
Insurance intermediaries should explain to employers that customers are liable
for submitting the relevant documents to insurers for policy application. They
should also remind the employers to act in utmost good faith in the course of the
application process and provide the insurers with true and accurate information.
If employers commented that such documents were not required in the past,
intermediaries should make it clear that the Standardized Practice is now
applicable to the entire insurance industry. That is, the employers are required
to provide the same information regardless of whether they buy the ECI from
insurance agents or brokers.
7.
Would an insurance intermediary be considered breaching the conduct
requirement if he / she fails to take all reasonable steps to obtain the necessary
information / documents from the employers?
Under the prevailing requirements, insurance intermediaries are required to
conduct business in good faith and with integrity at all times. It is also the
insurance intermediaries' obligation to explain to employers that customers are
held responsible for the information provided to the insurer. If the employer
provides the insurer with false information, this may leave the employer open to
legal action by the insurer for recovery of monies previously paid by the insurer
to indemnify any claim under the policy. If an intermediary instigates an
employer to submit false information or fails to do his best in reminding the
employer to submit the required information, he may be breaching the relevant
conduct requirements.
13

results.title_name_tc: 保誠精選「健康寶」
results.content_en:
PRUDENTIAL
保 誠 保 險
用心聆聽
實現您心
保誠精選「健康寶」
醫療
PRUDENTIAL
保 誠 保 險
Listening. Understanding. Delivering.
PRUChoice MediExtra
MEDICALPRUChoice MediExtra Medical Insurance
保誠精選「健康寶」醫療保障計劃
In view of ever increasing medical costs, being protected by your group or
personal medical insurance may not be sufficient to cover all of your
medical expenses if you suffer from an illness or, unfortunately, have an
accident. Hence, choosing a top-up medical plan in addition to your group
medical insurance is vital. Accordingly, Prudential General Insurance Hong
Kong Limited is pleased to offer you PRUChoice MediExtra Medical
Insurance which ensures you and your family can maintain more
comprehensive health protection.
(Applicable on or after 10 January, 2025)
隨著醫療通脹,若您不幸患病或遭遇意外,您的團體或個人醫療保
險可能未能全數支付高昂的醫療費用。因此,選擇一個與您的團體
醫療接軌的附加醫療保障計劃實在刻不容緩。保誠財險有限公司誠
意為您獻上保誠精選「健康寶」醫療保障計劃,令您及您家人的健
康獲得更周全的保障。
(2025年1月10日或之後適用)
Eligibility 申請資格
You can apply for PRUChoice MediExtra, with your family members
covered as dependent(s)*, should you and your family members be :
在申請保誠精選「健康寶」時,您及您供養*而受保的家人
必須:
· aged 64 or below
年齡在64歲或以下
· currently covered by a group or personal medical insurance
現正在一份團體或個人醫療保險中受保
* Dependents refer to your spouse and any unmarried child aged between 15 days and
18 years old (or aged below 23, when they are in full time education with valid proof).
您供養的家人指您的配偶,及年齡介乎於15天至18歲的未婚子女(或未滿23歲
就讀全日制學校的未婚子女,惟需提供有效證明文件)。
Special Features 計劃特點
1
Standalone Basic Top Up Medical Plan
可單獨購買基本住院附加醫療保障計劃
You can insure with the standalone Basic Top Up Medical Plan even if
you may have been covered by group or personal medical insurance.
即使您已擁有團體或個人醫療保險,您仍可以單獨購買基本住院
附加醫療保障計劃。
2
Flexibility in insuring with the Optional Hospital & Surgical Plan
可靈活選擇投保自選住院及手術保障計劃
You can apply for or purchase an Optional Hospital and Surgical Plan at
the time of newly insuring with the Basic Top Up Medical Plan, or at its
renewal, or within 45 days after your resignation, as required. Should
you opt to purchase an Optional Hospital and Surgical Plan within 45
days after your resignation, you can obtain comprehensive medical
coverage without the need to provide an updated health declaration.
您可靈活地根據您的需要,於新投保基本住院附加醫療保障計劃
或在其後續保時,或於離職後45天內申請或回購自選住院及手術
保障計劃。如您在離職後45天內選擇回購,您可在毋須重新提供
健康聲明的情況下,獲得全面的醫療保障。
3
24 Hours Emergency Assistance Services
24小時緊急支援服務
Assistance Services with unlimited cover for worldwide emergency
medical evacuation and repatriation to Hong Kong are provided by
EAHK Alarm Centre free of charge.
我們為您安排由EAHK救援中心提供的免費全球支援服務,其中全
球緊急醫療救援及護送回港服務更不設保障限額。
4
Guaranteed Renewal and Worldwide Protection
續保保證及全球性保障
Once you have taken out PRUChoice MediExtra Medical Insurance, you
can enjoy protection and guaranteed renewable* protection regardless
of your health condition. The Basic Top Up Medical Plan is renewable up
to aged 100 and Optional Hospital & Surgical Plan is life-long renewable.
一旦成為保誠精選「健康寶」醫療保障計劃的受保客戶,無論您
的健康情況如何,都會獲得全球性保障及保單續保保證 *。 基本住
院附加醫療保障計劃可續保至100歲及自選住院及手術保障計劃則
是終身續保。
5
No Individual Loading Regardless of Claim Experience
並不因索償記錄而需獨自承受附加保費
Risks under PRUChoice MediExtra are managed on a community pool
basis and your premium will not be loaded because of your claim history
after insured.
保誠精選「健康寶」的風險是由所有受保人共同承擔。您不需要擔
心因為您投保後的索償記錄而需獨自承受附加的額外保費。
6
Easy to Join
投保容易
Simply fill in the attached PRUChoice MediExtra Medical Insurance
Application Form and enjoy peace of mind in addition to group or
personal medical insurance as no medical examination is required.
投保手續簡易,只需填妥附頁的保誠精選「健康寶」醫療保障計
劃申請表,在毋須驗身的情況下即可在團體或個人醫療保險以外
享獲安枕無憂的醫療保障。
* Subject to the table of benefits, the table of premium, the schedule of surgical operations, the
terms and conditions of the policy, and additions/ amendments to the policy being in force at
the time of renewal.
受每年續保根據續保時生效的保障金額表、保費表、外科手術分類表、保單條款、條
件的更改及保單的新增/修訂限制。
No Claim Premium Refund
無索償保費回贈
$
In the event of no claim being made, submitted, reported or arising
under the Policy for every period of 3 full consecutive policy years, we
will pay you back a No Claim Premium Refund equal to 15% of
premium paid during the 3 policy years after the end of that 3-year
period, provided that the policy is renewed.
如在保險期間,以每連續三個完整保單年度計算,沒有於保單
中報告或提交任何索償,我們將於三個保單年度完結後回贈您
在該三年期間所繳付保費的15%,惟有關保單必須繼續續保。
Major Exclusions 主要不受保障項目
· Treatment arising from war, invasion, civil war, hostilities and act
of terrorism
· Illness or injury which originated before the effective date
· Pregnancy, miscarriage, abortion, childbirth, birth control and
treatment of infertility
· Treatment arising from abuse of drugs, alcohol, self-inflicted
injuries or sexually transmitted diseases
· Treatment for AIDS or HIV-related conditions which originate
during the first five years of insurance
· Treatment relating to congenital or hereditary conditions or
diseases
· Hospitalisation primarily for diagnostic scanning, X-ray
examinations or for physical therapy only
(For more details, please refer to the Policy. )
● 因戰爭、入侵、內戰、敵對及恐怖主義活動等引致之治療
● 在保障生效日期前已存在之疾病或損傷
● 懷孕、流產、墮胎、分娩、節育及治療不育
● 因濫用藥物、酗酒、經自傷身體或因性接觸感染之疾病所
引致的治療
● 在投保的首5年內,因後天免疫力缺乏症(愛滋病)或與人
類免疫力缺乏之相關病毒(HIV) 引致的治療
● 任何有關先天性或遺傳性情況或疾病的治療
● 所有純粹因斷症掃描、X光檢查或作物理治療程序而住院的
治療
(欲知詳情,請參閱保單。)

results.content_en:
的私隱通知,並建議閣下瀏覽本公司網站以了解該私隱通知。該私隱通知可在本公司網站
〔https://www.prudential.com.hk/scws/pages/tc/privacy-policy/index.html〕 上查閱。閣下填妥並繼續提交本表格,即表示閣下確認已閱讀並理解本
收集個人資料聲明。
業務合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商、提供行政、電信、電腦、信息技術、數據處理及儲存、客戶滿意度分析、支付、印刷、贖回或其他
服務予我們,以使我們能夠經營我們業務,會計師、審計師、IT服務和平台供應商、保險中介機構、再保險承保人、投資經理、代理、
退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人、核准的第三方金融和保險產品供應商以及我們的法律顧問。
營銷合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商提供行政、電信、電腦、支付、印刷、第三方獎賞/會員/優惠計劃、醫療/健康/保健相關產品、
贖回或其他服務,以使我們能夠經營我們業務、保險中介、退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人和核准的第三方金融和
保險產品供應商。

15/16
PAIUWH1515
LAPA/PAIUWH (09/23)Part 8
Cancellation Right and Refund of Premium(s) and Levy (Only applicable to Voluntary Health Insurance Scheme)
第八部分 取消權利及退回保費及保費徵費(只適用於自願醫保計劃)
Cancellation Rights & Refund of Premium(s) and Levy within Cooling-off Period
I/We, the Policyowner, understand that I/We have the right to cancel this supplementary benefit and obtain a refund of any premium(s) paid (less any market
value adjustment and any withdrawals, if any) and any levy(ies) by returning the original policy endorsement and policy provision# (#only applicable for receiving
policy endorsement and policy provision in physical copy) by giving written notice to Prudential Hong Kong Limited. Such notice must be signed by me/us and
received directly by Prudential Hong Kong Limited at 8/F, Prudential Tower, The Gateway Harbour City, 21 Canton Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong within
Cooling-off Period. I/We understand that the Cooling-off Period is the period of 21 calendar days immediately following either the day of delivery of the policy or
the Cooling-off Notice to me or my nominated representative (whichever is the earlier). I/We understand that the cooling-off notice is a notice that will be sent
to me/us or my/our nominated representative by Prudential Hong Kong Limited to notify me of the Cooling-off Period around the time the policy is delivered. The
day of delivery of the insurance policy or the Cooling-off Notice is not included for the calculation of the 21 calendar day period. If the last day of the 21 calendar
day period is not a working day, the period shall include the next working day. Working day means a day other than (i) a public holiday; (ii) a Saturday; or (iii) a
gale warning day or black rainstorm warning day. For investment-linked policies/ or supplementary benefits, the refund of premium(s) and any levy(ies) paid will
be subject to a deduction of the amount, by which the value of my/ our investment has fallen (if any) at the time when my/ our cancellation letter is received
by Prudential Hong Kong Limited. No refund will be made if a claim payment has been made paid. This proposal should only be issued in conjunction with the
principal brochure and the illustration document (in respect of the insurance plan) which I/We have read and understood before signing this proposal.
This document is intended to be distributed in Hong Kong only and shall not be construed as an offer to sell or solicitation to buy or provision of any insurance
product outside Hong Kong. Prudential Hong Kong Limited does not offer or sell and insurance product in any jurisdictions outside Hong Kong in which such
offering or sale of the insurance product is illegal under the laws of such jurisdictions.
在冷靜期內取消權利及退回保費及保費徵費
本人/吾等,作為保單持有人,明白本人/吾等有權把保單批註及保單條款正本退回#(#只適用於收取紙張保單批註及保單條款)並以書面
通知要求取消自願醫保計劃及取回所有已繳保費(扣除市場價值調整及任何曾提取之現金金額,如適用)及保費徵費;但是本人/吾等必須
簽署該通知,並確保保誠保險有限公司設於香港九龍尖沙咀廣東道21號海港城港威大廈英國保誠保險大樓8樓之辦事處於冷靜期內直接
收到該通知。本人/吾等了解,冷靜期為緊接保單或冷靜期通知書交付予本人/吾等或本人/吾等的指定代表後起計的21個曆日內,以較
先者為準。本人/吾等了解,冷靜期通知書是由保誠保險有限公司在交付保單時致予本人/吾等或本人/吾等的指定代表的一份通知書,
以就冷靜期一事通知本人。交付保單或冷靜期通知書當天並不包括在計算21個曆日的期間內。若第21個曆日當天並非工作天,則冷靜
期將包括隨後的工作天的一天在內。「工作天」指除(i)公眾假期;(ii)星期六;或(ii)《釋義及通則條例》所定義的烈風警告日或黑色暴雨
警告日以外的日子。如屬投資相連壽險保單/或附加保障,所退回之已繳保費及保費徵費將必須先扣除當於保誠保險有限公司收到本人/
吾等取消保單的申請時本人/吾等之投資可能出現之市值虧損。惟已獲得理賠償者,將不獲得任何退款。
此申請書只可連同保險計劃的主要銷售刊物及保險利益說明書一併發出。本人/吾等在簽署本申請書前,已細閱及明白與申請書有關的
主要銷售刊物 及保險利益説明書的內容。此文件僅旨在香港派發,並不能詮釋為在香港境外提供或出售或遊說購買任何保險產品。如在
香港境外之任何司法管轄區的法律下提供或出售任何保險產品屬於違法,保誠保險有限公司不會在該司法管轄區提供或出售該保險產品。

LAPA/PAIUWH (09/23)Part 8
Cancellation Right and Refund of Premium(s) and Levy (Only applicable to Voluntary Health Insurance Scheme)
第八部分 取消權利及退回保費及保費徵費(只適用於自願醫保計劃)
Cancellation Rights & Refund of Premium(s) and Levy within Cooling-off Period
I/We, the Policyowner, understand that I/We have the right to cancel this supplementary benefit and obtain a refund of any premium(s) paid (less any market
value adjustment and any withdrawals, if any) and any levy(ies) by returning the original policy endorsement and policy provision# (#only applicable for receiving
policy endorsement and policy provision in physical copy) by giving written notice to Prudential Hong Kong Limited. Such notice must be signed by me/us and
received directly by Prudential Hong Kong Limited at 8/F, Prudential Tower, The Gateway Harbour City, 21 Canton Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong within
Cooling-off Period. I/We understand that the Cooling-off Period is the period of 21 calendar days immediately following either the day of delivery of the policy or
the Cooling-off Notice to me or my nominated representative (whichever is the earlier). I/We understand that the cooling-off notice is a notice that will be sent
to me/us or my/our nominated representative by Prudential Hong Kong Limited to notify me of the Cooling-off Period around the time the policy is delivered. The
day of delivery of the insurance policy or the Cooling-off Notice is not included for the calculation of the 21 calendar day period. If the last day of the 21 calendar
day period is not a working day, the period shall include the next working day. Working day means a day other than (i) a public holiday; (ii) a Saturday; or (iii) a
gale warning day or black rainstorm warning day. For investment-linked policies/ or supplementary benefits, the refund of premium(s) and any levy(ies) paid will
be subject to a deduction of the amount, by which the value of my/ our investment has fallen (if any) at the time when my/ our cancellation letter is received
by Prudential Hong Kong Limited. No refund will be made if a claim payment has been made paid. This proposal should only be issued in conjunction with the
principal brochure and the illustration document (in respect of the insurance plan) which I/We have read and understood before signing this proposal.
This document is intended to be distributed in Hong Kong only and shall not be construed as an offer to sell or solicitation to buy or provision of any insurance
product outside Hong Kong. Prudential Hong Kong Limited does not offer or sell and insurance product in any jurisdictions outside Hong Kong in which such
offering or sale of the insurance product is illegal under the laws of such jurisdictions.
在冷靜期內取消權利及退回保費及保費徵費

results.content_en:

收集個人資料聲明。
業務合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商、提供行政、電信、電腦、信息技術、數據處理及儲存、客戶滿意度分析、支付、印刷、贖回或其他服務予
我們,以使我們能夠經營我們業務,會計師、審計師、IT服務和平台供應商、保險中介機構、再保險承保人、投資經理、代理、退休金受託人
(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人、核准的第三方金融和保險產品供應商以及我們的法律顧問。
營銷合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商提供行政、電信、電腦、支付、印刷、第三方獎賞/會員/ 優惠計劃、醫療/ 健康/保健相關產品、贖回或
其他服務,以使我們能夠經營我們業務、保險中介、退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人和核准的第三方金融和保險產品供應
商。
Name
姓名
Date (DD/MM/YYYY)
日期(日/ 月/年)
Signature of Insured
受保人簽署
5Important Notes 重要事項
1. Please substantiate your claim application with relevant document(s), you are referred to the list of document(s) that we would require for processing your claim
application.
請提交有關文件以證明閣下的索償申請;請參考下列表單,當中列出我們在處理閣下索償申請時可能需要的文件。
2. All reports, information and evidences that you provide to substantiate your claim application shall be furnished at your own expenses.
閣下請自費提供用作證明本索償申請的報告、資料及證明。
3. Please submit this claim form to us within 30 days of the occurrence in the case of non-fatal bodily injury, or within 7 days in case of death.
如屬非死亡事故的身體損傷索償,請於意外發生後30天內遞交本索償表格。如為死亡索償,請於意外發生後7天內遞交本索償表格。
4. To expedite the claim process, kindly submit this claim form together with all original supporting document(s).
敬請同時遞交所有用以證明本索償的文件正本,以便我們盡快處理有關索償。
5. According to the terms and conditions of your insurance with the Company, the following types of claims and/ or expenses shall not be recoverable:
按閣下與本公司的保險條款及細則,若有關索償/或開支由下述原因所引致,一概屬不保情況:
· Claims relating to sickness or disease
與疾病或病患有關的索償
6. You are recommended to refer to the policy wordings should you be uncertain on the coverage of this insurance.
如閣下就本保險中所提供的保障有不清晰地方,請參閱有關保單條文。
Please ensure the following original relevant document(s) will be submitted together with this claim form.
請確保以下所示的有關文件正本,連同本索償表格一併交回。
Worry Free Accident Insurance
隨意保意外保險
In respect of claims of the following 與下述有關的索償:
Accidental Death
意外死亡
Permanent Disablement
永久性傷殘
Accidental Hospital Cash
意外住院現金
Death Certificate (If applicable)
死亡證(如適用)
>
Medical report
醫療報告
V
Original sick leave certificate
病假證明書
V
Medical Certificate
醫療報告書
>
Journey Safe Accident Insurance
乘車保意外保險
In respect of claims of the following 與下述有關的索償:
Accidental Death
意外死亡
Permanent Disablement
永久性傷殘
Compassionate Benefit for
Unattended Children
子女體恤現金補貼
Death Certificate (If applicable)
死亡證(如適用)
V
Medical report
醫療報告
Original sick leave certificate
病假證明書
V
Medical Certificate
醫療報告書
V
Children's birth certificate
子女出生證明
Please also note that further information and/ or document(s) may be needed. We shall write to you when necessary.
如有需要,我們將另行發書函索取附加資料及/或文件,敬請留意。
End

results.title_name_tc: 僱員補償保險的申報工資指引（適用由二零一九年一月一日起生效的新保單及續保保單）
results.content_en:
.
2019年1月1日生效處理的續保/起保申請,是否一樣需要填報所需資料?
答:
僱員資料的申報要求並沒有改變,按照勞工法例,僱主必須為僱員購買勞工保險。在購買
勞保時僱主必須如實申報僱員資料。在訂立勞保合約/續保時,僱主應披露所需的重要事
實,包括(但不限於)準確的僱員人數及其實際薪金資料,並須涵蓋所有僱員,不論其合
約期或工作時數長短、全職或兼職、長工或臨時工、工作地點、工種或職位。至於薪金資
料的申報,則以相關期間的強積金供款紀錄/報稅紀錄/會計紀錄為準。若申報時作出虛
報資料或有失實的情況下,保險公司或會從法律途徑向僱主追討從保單中已賠付的金額。
9.
假如客戶對「統一僱員補償保險作業模式–申報僱員薪酬」的要求存疑,可以在哪兒找
到相關資料?
答:
香港保險業聯會網頁:https://www.hkfi.org.hk/eci/b5/index.html
此外,保險業監管局及勞工處亦有提供小冊子「投購勞保知多啲」:
https://www.labour.gov.hk/tc/public/pdf/ecd/Know more about taking out ECI tc.pdf
11A set of FAQ is prepared by The Hong Kong Federation of Insurers
Employees' Compensation Insurance (ECI) Standardised Practice -
Report of Wageroll Declaration
FAQ
Public / Employer
1.
In the past, I was not requested to submit these certificates and documents when
taking out ECI policies. Why is there such an additional requirement now? Is it a tactic
for insurers to increase premiums?
ECI policy covers employer's liability to compensate the employee who sustain
an injury or dies from an accident arisen out of his/her employment. When
buying a new / renewing an ECI contract, employers must disclose all material
facts as requested, including (but not limited to) the actual number of employees
and actual earnings. The information must cover all employees, irrespective of
their length of employment contract or working hours, contract type (i.e. part time
/ full time, permanent / temporary), work location, occupation or position. For the
report on actual earnings, employers are required to provide evidence such as
MPF contribution records in the relevant period / tax returns / accounting records.
It has been stipulated in the policy terms and conditions that employers must
report the actual number of employees and earnings amount. The Standardized
Practice only serves to reinforce such requirements, which will reflect the actual
risks borne by insurers, thus ensuring employers and employees are protected
accordingly.
2.
What are the consequences if the number of employees is understated when
taking out the ECI policy?
If the employer fails to report the actual information at the time of buying /
renewing the ECI policy, this may leave the employer open to legal action by the
insurer for recovery of monies previously paid by the insurer to indemnify any
claim under the policy.
3.
When taking out ECI, employers need to provide what kind of information and
documents to insurers and insurance intermediaries?
➢
Company information (e.g. nature of business, business registration)
➢
➢
Employee information (e.g. number of employees, part time / full time,
permanent / temporary work, work location, occupation / position, actual
earnings, requirement to work or take business trips outside of Hong Kong, etc.)
Past claims records
➢
Wageroll records (including MPF contributions records in the previous 12 months
/ relevant tax returns / accounting records)
4.
If I have questions, who should I talk to?
For enquiries, please contact your insurance intermediaries or insurers.
12

results.content_en:
and
exceptions of Section I shall automatically apply to the optional plans
but not vice versa.
v.
Under no circumstances shall the optional plans be accepted again once
the previous optional plans have been terminated for whatever reason.
5. Policy Review Period
In case the Insured is not completely satisfied, the Insured is allowed to
IMPORTANT - the Insured Person is requested to read this Policy. If any error or omission be found, the Policy should be returned to the Company for correction.cancel this Policy within the Policy Review Period, which is thirty (30) days
from the Effective Date of the Policy. Any Premium paid will be refunded to
you, provided that: (i) the Policy and the Certificate of Insurance, together
with a variation form signed by the Policyholder(s), are received by us within
the Policy Review Period and (ii) have not filed any claims under the Policy.
6. Payment of Premium
i. If the payment method selected is either via autopay or credit card, the
premium for this Policy shall be collected from the Insured's nominated
account in accordance with the collection date as stated in the Certificate
of Insurance. A second attempt will be made in the middle of the current
month should the previous collection fail due to insufficient funds.
ii.
If the payment mode is yearly by autopay or yearly by credit card, the
Insured may request to change the nominated autopay bank account or
credit card account from which premium has been collected by completing
and returning a Payment Details Amendment Form to the Company.
Provided that the setup of the new nominated account is confirmed, the
Company will start the premium collection from the account on the next
collection date. Should the payment method be by autopay the Insured
must return the completed Payment Details Amendment Form to the
Company two (2) months before the use of the new payment method.
If the payment method is by credit card, the Insured must return the
completed Payment Details Amendment Form to the Company ten (10)
working days before the use of the new payment method. Change of
payment mode is not allowed during the Policy Year.
iii. If the payment mode is monthly by autopay or monthly by credit
card, the Insured may request to change the nominated autopay bank
account or credit card account from which premium has been collected
by completing and returning a Payment Details Amendment Form to
the Company. Should the payment method be monthly by autopay the
Insured must return the Form together with a cheque for the premium
for the coming two (2) months. Provided that the setup of the new
nominated account is confirmed, the Company will resume monthly
premium collection on the third collection date from the date on which
such request is received. If the payment method is by credit card, the
Insured must return the completed Payment Details Amendment Form to
the Company ten (10) working days before the use of the new payment
method. Change of payment mode is not allowed during the Policy Year.
iv.
The Company shall have the right to change the collection date of
this Policy without prior notice, as well as have the right to revise and
determine the payment method of this Policy.
V.
Premium will be due for the full twelve (12) months' Period of Insurance
from the Effective Date regardless of yearly or monthly payment mode.
Eligible claims will be reimbursed only if the premium is paid up to date
at the time the claim is payable by the Company and the Insured is not
allowed to apply for mid-term cancellation during the Policy Year.
vi. No refund of premium shall be allowed once the Policy has been effected.
7.
Renewal and Variation
i.
The Company will notify the Insured of any alteration in relation to this
Policy that the Company deems to be material, but any accidental omission
or failure to notify the Insured shall not invalidate such alteration.
ii.
The Policy shall be effective for a period of one (1) year and shall be
guaranteed to be renewed annually (regardless of age of the Insured
Person) for Section I whilst the Policy shall be guaranteed to be renewed
annually for Section II the Optional Medical Plus Plan up to age 100
and for Section III the Optional Hospital Cash Plan shall be guaranteed
to be renewed annually up to age 74, subject to the Table of Benefits,
the Table of Premium, the Schedule of Surgical Operations, and the
Additions/ Amendments to this Policy that generally are in force at the
renewal date.
iii. The Company will renew this Policy automatically on a yearly basis upon
successful premium collection for such renewal, unless a designated
PRUChoice Medical-Variation Form for policy termination has been
received by the Company ten (10) days before the Effective Date of
the renewal.
iv.
If the payment mode is yearly by autopay or yearly by credit card renewal,
the premium for the coming year shall be collected from the Insured's
nominated account automatically on the collection date as stated in
the renewal documents. If the payment mode is monthly by autopay or
monthly by credit card renewal, the premium will be collected monthly
from the Insured's nominated account automatically on the collection
date as stated in the renewal documents.
V.
Except for changing the nominated account from which premium has
been collected as mentioned in 5(ii) and (iii) above, the Insured may
apply for other variations by completing the Variation Form within one
(1) month before the Effective Date of renewal for the approval of the
Company.
vi. Acceptance of any higher level of cover shall not apply to any conditions
or complaints existing at the time of the Company's acceptance for which
there was then a foreseeable need for Treatment or for consultation
with any medical practitioner, unless such foreseeable need was fully
disclosed to the Company at the time of application and accepted by
the Company.
vii. The Company shall have the right to alter the Table of Benefits (including
the Table of Premium) and the terms and conditions of this Policy from
time to time. This Policy shall not be subject to any such alternations
until the next renewal of this Policy.
viii. The Company has the right to adjust premium rates on a community
pool basis because of several factors, including the Company's claims
and persistency experience.
8.
Termination
In case of non-payment of premium, the Company shall have the right to
terminate this Policy by sending a written termination notice to the Insured
at his/ her last known address; such termination of this Policy shall become
effective on the first date when premium is not received by the Company.
9.
Currency
i.
Both premium and claims of this Policy shall be made in Hong Kong
dollars.
ii.
Any claim under this Policy made by the Insured in a currency other
than Hong Kong dollars shall be converted to Hong Kong dollars at the
official buying rate of such currency for Hong Kong dollars in effect in
Hong Kong at the date of clinical visit or date of discharge from Hospital
or, if no such official rate exists, at the rate certified as appropriate by
bankers of the Company for the time being.
10. Claims
i.
Any medical report as reasonably required by the Company shall be
furnished at the expense of the Insured. The Company shall have the
right to medically examine any Insured Person in respect of the submitted
claim and shall also have the right to require an autopsy in case of the
death of any Insured Person where it is not forbidden by law.
ii.
Any claim payments made in any circumstances for which this Policy
does not provide shall in all cases be at the Company's sole discretion.
iii.
If any claim made shall be found to be fraudulent or exaggerated, the
Company shall have the right to terminate this Policy and the Insured
and the Insured Person shall repay to the Company all indemnity and
benefits paid by the Company in respect of such fraudulent or exaggerated
claims. The Company shall have the right to recover from the Insured
and the Insured Person any costs in relation to such termination and
such fraudulent or exaggerated claims.
iv.
Any claim payments will be made to the bank account as designated
by the Insured at the time of application of this policy, or by a cheque
payable to the Insured should the bank account not be designated at
the time of such application.
V.
The Insured must report to the Company in writing in case of the loss
of a daims cheque. A handling fee of HK$100 shall be charged for each
cheque reissuance.
vi.
No reimbursement of claims shall be made for claim(s) submitted after
ninety (90) days from the date of the expenditure being incurred or
insufficiency of required information.
11. Jurisdiction
The Policy shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws
of Hong Kong. The parties agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of
Hong Kong courts.
12. Assignment
This Policy shall not be assignable and payment of any indemnity and benefits
by the Company under this Policy shall only be made to the Insured or his/
her legal personal representatives whose receipt of such indemnity and
benefits from the Company via cheque or by autopay through the Insured's
nominated bank account number for claim reimbursement, shall be a full
discharge of the Company's obligation towards the Insured and the Insured
Person in respect of such claim.
13. Arbitration
All differences, disputes or claims arising out of this Policy shall be referred
to the decision of an arbitrator to be appointed in writing by the parties in
difference or if they cannot agree upon a single arbitrator, to the decision
of two arbitrators one to be appointed by each of the parties in writing or,
in case the arbitrators do not agree with each other an umpire appointed
by the arbitrators in writing will make a decision. The making of the award
shall be a condition precedent to any liability of the Company or any right of
action against the Company in respect of any claim. The seat of arbitration
shall be in Hong Kong.
14. Third Party Right
A person or entity who is not a party to this Policy shall have no rights under
the Contracts (Rights of Third Parties) Ordinance (Cap. 623 of the Laws of
Hong Kong) to enforce any terms of this Policy.
15. Prevailing Provision
The terms and conditions of this Insurance are set out in both English and
Chinese. In the event that conflicts or inconsistence arise between the English
and Chinese versions, the English version shall prevail.
IMPORTANT - the Insured Person is requested to read this Policy. If any error or omission be found, the Policy should be returned to the Company for correction.
