results.content_en:
by the Insured or
by any person acting on behalf of the Insured holding a professional
qualification of professional skill associated with such qualification.
II. The Company shall not cover any third party liability or any associated costs
and expense directly or indirectly caused by resulting from or in connection
with any of the following:
IMPORTANT - the Insured is requested to read this Policy. If any error or omission be found, the Policy should be returned to the Company for correction.
3Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary, this insurance excludes any
loss, damage, liability, expense, fines, penalties or any other amount directly or
indirectly caused by, in connection with, or in any way involving or arising out
of any of the following including any fear or threat thereof, whether actual or
perceived:
· Coronavirus (COVID-19) including any mutation or variation thereof;
· or any declaration, categorisation, characterisation, reference to or in
any other way communication as an epidemic or pandemic by the World
Health Organisation or other governmental or quasi-governmental public
health agency, entity or service that may make such declaration
Exceptions to Section 1 - Optional Material Damage Plan and
Section 2 - Basic Third Party Liability and their extensions
1. The Company shall not indemnify the Insured in respect of liability loss
damage cost or expense in respect of Insured Works and/ or Contract Works
involving the application of heat within or in the vicinity of the premises
described as Insured Premises unless the following precautions are in
operations:
I.
General
(a) the area in which the operation is to be carried out must be clear
and free from combustible materials before operations commence;
(b) before carrying cut and work on one side of a wall or partition, an
inspection must be made on the opposite side to the work to ensure
that no combustible materials are in danger of ignition either
directly or by condition of heat;
(c) except for cold joint plumbing or painting Contract involving
one man only at least one responsible official must be present at
commencement of the operation and two or more must be present
during the whole period of operation;
(d) a thorough examination must be made in the vicinity after
termination of each period of work;
(e) portable fire extinguishing appliances must be kept available for
immediate use;
II. Oxy-acetylene and other welding and cutting equipment
(a) the area in which the work is to be carried out must be shielded
adequately by the use of fire-resistant material;
(b) combustible floors in the area must be covered with sand or
protected with overlapping sheets of non-combustible material;
III. Blow lamps and blow torches
(a) blow lamps must be filled only in the open;
(b) blow lamps must be lighted immediately before work commences
and extinguished immediately after work ceases;
(c) lighted blow lamps must not be left unattended
2. The Company shall not indemnify the Insured in respect of liability loss
damage cost or expense in respect of Insured Works and/ or Contract Works
directly or indirectly arising from any locomotive waterborne vessel aircraft
or vehicle other than any land vehicle which is used solely on the Insured
Premises of the contract project and which is not used on any public road or
public highway to which any Road Traffic Legislation applies;
Exception to Section 4 - Optional Employee's Compensation Insurance
I. Any liability of the Contractor which attaches by virtue of an agreement but
which would not have attached in the absence of such agreement;
II. Any sum which the Contractor would have been entitled to recover from any
party but for an agreement between the Contractor and such party;
III. Any liability arising from Pneumoconiosis or Mesothelioma of Noise-Induced
Deafness;
IV. The Contractor's liability to any person who is not an Employee of the
Contractor within the meaning of the Ordinance;
V. Any late payment surcharge fines penalties or punitive aggravated or
exemplary damages for which the Contractor may become liable under the
Ordinance or independently of the Ordinance;
VI. Any injury by Accident or Disease where the Company has not been given
sufficient notice of the institution of proceedings in a court or tribunal to
enable the Company to be added as a party to the proceedings;
VII. Any loss or losses directly or indirectly arising out of resulting from or in
consequence of asbestos in whatever form or quantity.
GENERAL EXCEPTIONS
1. The Company shall not indemnify the Insured and insured parties as named
in the Schedule in respect of loss, damage or liability directly or indirectly
caused by or arising out of the following:
(a) strike, riot, lock out, civil commotion or persons taking part in labour
disturbances;
(b) nuclear weapons, material, ionising radiations or contamination by
radioactivity from any nuclear fuel or from any nuclear waste, from
the combustion of nuclear fuel and for the purposes of this General
Exception combustion shall include any self-sustaining process of nuclear
fission.
2.
This Policy excludes loss damage cost or expense of whatsoever nature
directly or indirectly caused by, resulting from or in connection with any of the
following regardless of any other cause or event contributing concurrently or
in any other sequence to the loss:
(a) war, invasion acts of foreign enemies, hostilities or warlike operations
(whether war be declared or not) civil war rebellion revolution insurrection
civil commotion assuming the proportions of or amounting to an uprising
military or usurped power; or
(b) any act of terrorism.
For the purpose of this General Exception an act of terrorism means an
act including but not limited to the use of force or violence and/ or the
threat thereof of any person or group(s) of persons whether acting alone
or on behalf of or in connection with any organisation(s) or government(s)
committed for political religious ideological or similar purposes including the
intention to influence any government and/ or to put the public or any section
of the public in fear.
This General Exception also excludes loss damage cost or expense of
whatsoever nature directly or indirectly caused by resulting from or in
connection with any action taken in controlling preventing suppressing or in
any way relating to (a) and/ or (b) above.
In the event any portion of this General Exception is found to be invalid or
unenforceable the remainder shall remain in full force and effect.

indirectly arising out of:
(a) biological ør chemical contamination;
(b) missiles bombs grenades explosives;
due to any act of terrorism.
For the purpose of this General Exception an act of terrorism means an
aet including but not limited to the use of force or violence and/ or the
threat thereof of any person or group(s) of persons whether acting alone
or on behalf of or in connection with any organisation(s) or government(s)
committed for political religious ideological or ethnic purposes or reasons
including the intention to influence any government and/or to put the public
or any section of the public in fear.
For the purpose of (a) "contamination" means the contamination poisoning
or prevention and/ or limitation of the use of objects due to the effects of
chemical and/ or biological substances.
4.
Damage to the substance of property shall not include damage to data or
software in particular any detrimental change in data software or computer
programs that is caused by a deletion a corruption or a deformation of the
original structure. Consequently the following are excluded from this Policy:

change in data, software or computer programs that is caused by a
deletion a corruption or a deformation of the original structure and
any business interruption losses resulting from such loss or damage.
Notwithstanding this General Exception loss of or damage to data or
software which is the direct consequence of Insured physical damage to
the substance or property shall be covered.

range of use or accessibility of data software or computer programs and
any business interruption losses resulting from such loss or damage.

This Policy shall not cover liability loss damage cost or expense directly or

Important Notes 重要事項:
(1) This form is made subject to below terms and conditions.
此表格愛以下條款及細則所約束。

當我們接受了此受益人申請表生發出背書,背書將網成保單的一部分。
(3) Please complete all sections below for the application of beneficiary designation, and failure to do so may result in your application being delayed. The application of beneficiary designation,
however, does not affect the effectiveness of insurance application.
請填妥以下有關部份,如有盡薩,可能會延調申請。此受装入申請的確認與否,並不影響保險申請的有效性。
(4) Please be advised that the beneficiary designation shall take at least 4 working days to be confirmed effective. Kindly make sure to submit completed and signed insurance application form and
beneficiary designation form 4 working days before the effective date of the insurance application. Upon having been confirmed, the beneficiary designation shall take effect from the effective
of the insurance application or the date when the beneficiary designation form is received by GIEB Department, whichever is later.
由於確認受益人申請需與最少四個工作天,所以請於所要求的保險生效日四個工作天前補交已填妥及簽署的保險申請表及受益人申請表。當受益人申請練確認生效後,受益人申請的生
效日將依從保險生效日,或以一般保險及僅為福利部收到受益人申請表當日為依歸,以較後者為準。
(5) The Policyholder is not allowed to designate beneficiary(les) for the Insured Person aged below 18.
保單持有人不可為年齡在十八歲以下的受保人作受益人申請
(6) The client has specified the name, the HKID number or birth certificate number or passport number (if no HKID) or BR number (if applied in company's name), the relationships and the share of
the beneficiaryfies) on the beneficiary designation form.
客戶在受益人申請表上,已填妥受益人姓名、香港身份證號碼/出生證明書號碼/護照號碼(對沒有香港身份證]/商業登記號碼(數以公司名義申請)+關係及賠償金百分比分配。
(7) The total shore should be equal to 100%.
賠償金百分比分配的總和必須為100%-
8) To avoid conflict of interest, Financial Consultant could not be the Beneficiary except helshe is the Spouse/ Parents/' Siblings/ Grandparent to the Life Assured."
避免利益衝窝,理财顧問不能成為受益人(與要保人的關係為配偶/父母/子文/兄弟師妹/祖父母除外)。
9). For a Policyowner to nome a Charitable Institution as the Beneficiary (policy donation), a substantial percentage of the benefit to a beneficiary charity (that is, over 50% of policy benefit or an
amount more than HK$ 1 Million, whichever is smaller), a written declaration with reason from the Policyowner is required
如保單持有人欲請聯及分配大部分保單利益(國過保單利益的百分之五十或數項藏過港幣一百萬元,以較少者為準)予華養機構,必須另外提交響異聲明及提供原因以證明此意願。
(10) Business Registration Certificate of the Charitable Institution and proofs / Reference of Charitable Activities are NOT required for naming the charitable institution which can be searched in
below link: http://www.ird.gov.hk/eng/taxlach_search.htm for Tax Exempt Charities
將保單捐贈予下列藝舊機構(網址:http:/www.ind.gov.hk/ong/tax/ach_search.htm),不需要擴供商業登記證或藝養活動證明副本。
(11) We wil call the contact number on the application form for verification if the signature on the Beneficiary Designation form cannot be verified. We should have the right to reject this form if
client fails to fulfil Prudential's requirement.
如果無法驗證受益人申請表上的簽名,我們將致電保險申請表上客戶的聯
碼進行驗證。對果客戶未能符合保誠的要求,我們有權現田此申請。

(3) Please complete all sections below for the application of beneficiary designation, and failure to do so may result in your application being delayed. The application of beneficiary designation,
however, does not affect the effectiveness of insurance application.
請填妥以下有關部份,如有盡薩,可能會延調申請。此受装入申請的確認與否,並不影響保險申請的有效性。
(4) Please be advised that the beneficiary designation shall take at least 4 working days to be confirmed effective. Kindly make sure to submit completed and signed insurance application form and
beneficiary designation form 4 working days before the effective date of the insurance application. Upon having been confirmed, the beneficiary designation shall take effect from the effective
of the insurance application or the date when the beneficiary designation form is received by GIEB Department, whichever is later.
由於確認受益人申請需與最少四個工作天,所以請於所要求的保險生效日四個工作天前補交已填妥及簽署的保險申請表及受益人申請表。當受益人申請練確認生效後,受益人申請的生
效日將依從保險生效日,或以一般保險及僅為福利部收到受益人申請表當日為依歸,以較後者為準。
(5) The Policyholder is not allowed to designate beneficiary(les) for the Insured Person aged below 18.
保單持有人不可為年齡在十八歲以下的受保人作受益人申請
(6) The client has specified the name, the HKID number or birth certificate number or passport number (if no HKID) or BR number (if applied in company's name), the relationships and the share of
the beneficiaryfies) on the beneficiary designation form.
客戶在受益人申請表上,已填妥受益人姓名、香港身份證號碼/出生證明書號碼/護照號碼(對沒有香港身份證]/商業登記號碼(數以公司名義申請)+關係及賠償金百分比分配。
(7) The total shore should be equal to 100%.
賠償金百分比分配的總和必須為100%-
8) To avoid conflict of interest, Financial Consultant could not be the Beneficiary except helshe is the Spouse/ Parents/' Siblings/ Grandparent to the Life Assured."
避免利益衝窝,理财顧問不能成為受益人(與要保人的關係為配偶/父母/子文/兄弟師妹/祖父母除外)。
9). For a Policyowner to nome a Charitable Institution as the Beneficiary (policy donation), a substantial percentage of the benefit to a beneficiary charity (that is, over 50% of policy benefit or an
amount more than HK$ 1 Million, whichever is smaller), a written declaration with reason from the Policyowner is required
如保單持有人欲請聯及分配大部分保單利益(國過保單利益的百分之五十或數項藏過港幣一百萬元,以較少者為準)予華養機構,必須另外提交響異聲明及提供原因以證明此意願。
(10) Business Registration Certificate of the Charitable Institution and proofs / Reference of Charitable Activities are NOT required for naming the charitable institution which can be searched in
below link: http://www.ird.gov.hk/eng/taxlach_search.htm for Tax Exempt Charities
將保單捐贈予下列藝舊機構(網址:http:/www.ind.gov.hk/ong/tax/ach_search.htm),不需要擴供商業登記證或藝養活動證明副本。
(11) We wil call the contact number on the application form for verification if the signature on the Beneficiary Designation form cannot be verified. We should have the right to reject this form if
client fails to fulfil Prudential's requirement.
